verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> concerning<WH1697> the drought.<WH1226>
Judah<WH3063> mourns,<WH56> and its gates<WH8179> languish,<WH535> they sit in black<WH6937> on the ground;<WH776> and the cry<WH6682> of Jerusalem<WH3389> is gone up.<WH5927>

Their nobles<WH117> send<WH7971> their little ones<WH6810> to the waters:<WH4325> they come<WH935> to the cisterns,<WH1356> and find<WH4672> no water;<WH4325> they return<WH7725> with their vessels<WH3627> empty;<WH7387> they are disappointed<WH3637> and confounded,<WH954> and cover<WH2645> their heads.<WH7218>
Because of the ground<WH127> which is cracked,<WH2865> because no rain<WH1653> has been in the land,<WH776> the plowmen<WH406> are disappointed,<WH954> they cover<WH2645> their heads.<WH7218>
Yes,<WH365> the hind also in the field<WH7704> calves,<WH3205> and forsakes<WH5800> her young,<WH1877> because there is no grass.
The wild donkeys<WH6501> stand<WH5975> on the bare heights,<WH8205> they pant<WH7602> for air<WH7307> like jackals;<WH8577> their eyes<WH5869> fail,<WH3615> because there is no herbage.<WH6212>
Though our iniquities<WH5771> testify<WH6030> against us,<WH6213> work for your name<WH8034>'s sake,<WH3068> Yahweh; for our backslidings<WH4878> are many;<WH7231> we have sinned against you.<WH2398>

You hope<WH4723> of Israel,<WH3478> its Savior<WH3467> in the time<WH6256> of trouble,<WH6869> why should you be as a foreigner<WH1616> in the land,<WH776> and as a wayfaring man<WH732> who turns aside<WH5186> to stay for a night?<WH3885>

Why should you be like a scared<WH1724> man,<WH376> as a mighty man<WH1368> who can't<WH3201> save?<WH3467> Yet you,<WH3068> Yahweh, are in the midst<WH7130> of us,<WH7121> and we are called by your name;<WH8034> don't<WH3240> leave us.

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> to this people,<WH5971> Even so have they loved<WH157> to wander;<WH5128> they have not refrained<WH2820> their feet:<WH7272> therefore Yahweh<WH3068> does not accept<WH7521> them;<WH2142> now he will remember their iniquity,<WH5771> and visit<WH6485> their sins.<WH2403>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH6419> Don't pray for this people<WH5971> for their good.<WH2896>

When they fast,<WH6684> I will not hear<WH8085> their cry;<WH7440> and when they offer<WH5927> burnt offering<WH5930> and meal offering,<WH4503> I will not accept<WH7521> them;<WH3615> but I will consume them by the sword,<WH2719> and by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence.<WH1698>

Then I said,<WH559> Ah,<WH162> Lord<WH136> Yahweh!<WH3069> behold,<WH5030> the prophets tell<WH559> them,<WH7200> You shall not see the sword,<WH2719> neither shall you have famine;<WH7458> but I will give<WH5414> you assured<WH571> peace<WH7965> in this place.<WH4725>

Then Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH5030> The prophets prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267> in my name;<WH8034> I didn't<WH7971> send them,<WH6680> neither have I commanded them,<WH1696> neither spoke I to them:<WH5012> they prophesy to you a lying<WH8267> vision,<WH2377> and divination,<WH7081> and a thing of nothing,<WH457> and the deceit<WH8649> of their own heart.<WH3820>

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> concerning the prophets<WH5030> who prophesy<WH5012> in my name,<WH8034> and I didn't<WH7971> send them,<WH559> yet they say, Sword<WH2719> and famine<WH7458> shall not be in this land:<WH776> By sword<WH2719> and famine<WH7458> shall those prophets<WH5030> be consumed.<WH8552>

The people<WH5971> to whom they prophesy<WH5012> shall be cast out<WH7993> in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389> because<WH6440> of the famine<WH7458> and the sword;<WH2719> and they shall have none to bury<WH6912> them<WH1992>â€”them, their wives,<WH802> nor their sons,<WH1121> nor their daughters:<WH1323> for I will pour<WH8210> their wickedness on them.<WH7451>

You shall say<WH559> this word<WH1697> to them,<WH5869> Let my eyes run down<WH3381> with tears<WH1832> night<WH3915> and day,<WH3119> and let them not cease;<WH1820> for the virgin<WH1330> daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> is broken<WH7665> with a great<WH1419> breach,<WH7667> with a very<WH3966> grievous<WH2470> wound.<WH4347>

If I go forth<WH3318> into the field,<WH7704> then,<WH2491> behold, the slain with the sword!<WH2719> and if I enter<WH935> into the city,<WH5892> then,<WH8463> behold, those who are sick with famine!<WH7458> for both the prophet<WH5030> and the priest<WH3548> go about<WH5503> in the land,<WH776> and have no knowledge.<WH3045>

Have you utterly<WH3988> rejected<WH3988> Judah?<WH3063> has your soul<WH5315> loathed<WH1602> Zion?<WH6726> why have you struck<WH5221> us,<WH4832> and there is no healing for us?<WH6960> We looked for peace,<WH7965> but no good<WH2896> came;<WH6256> and for a time of healing,<WH4832> and behold,<WH1205> dismay!
We acknowledge,<WH3045> Yahweh,<WH3068> our wickedness,<WH7562> and the iniquity<WH5771> of our fathers;<WH1> for we have sinned against you.<WH2398>
Do not abhor<WH5006> us,<WH8034> for your name's sake;<WH5034> do not disgrace the throne<WH3678> of your glory:<WH3519> remember,<WH2142> don't<WH6565> break your covenant with us.<WH1285>

Are there<WH3426> any among the vanities<WH1892> of the nations<WH1471> that can cause rain?<WH1652> or can the sky<WH8064> give<WH5414> showers?<WH7241> Aren't<WH3068> you he, Yahweh our God?<WH430> therefore we will wait<WH6960> for you;<WH6213> for you have made all these things.
